== About Cat ==

Cat is a [Functional functional] [StackLanguages stack-based programming language] designed by [ChristopherDiggins Christopher Diggins] and inspired by [Joy].

For a list of all Wiki pages see http://code.google.com/p/cat-language/w/list.
